General.Name: Xinjiang Talimu Agriculture Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Talimu Agriculture Development Co., Ltd. produces and sells various agricultural products in China and internationally. The company offers cotton, seeds, milk, forage, licorice, and other agricultural products. It is also involved in the livestock breeding; vegetable planting; and wholesale of agricultural product. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Aral, China.

0.Name: Mr. Chunjiang  Zhang
0.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
